executable.title: Cliptubes
executable.description: Return a set of tubes contained in a bounding box
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

double-vector.name: boxCorner
double-vector.label: Top Left Corner of Bounding Box
double-vector.description: 3D position from where to start bounding box

double-vector.name: boxSize
double-vector.label: Bounding Box Size
double-vector.description: Lenght (x radius), Height (y radius) and Depth (z radius) of the Box

file.name: outputTREFile
file.label: Output TRE File
file.description: Output TRE file containing tubes going through the Box
